ygData.subject: NEAT and non-FPS video games
ygData.msgSnippet: I am thinking of applying for a grant to apply NEAT to video games. I am interested if anyone has ideas on applying NEAT to non-first person shooter (FPS)

I am thinking of applying for a grant to apply NEAT to video games. I
am in=
terested if anyone has ideas on applying NEAT to non-first person
shooter (=
FPS) games.

I'd be interested in ideas on how to use NEAT to develop react=
ive
emotions for players. Essentially I'd like to see anyones ideas on how
=
to give non player characters (NPC)emotions.

Any other ideas of applying N=
EAT to non-FPS games would be greatly
appreciated and I will shamelessly co=
py them and put them in my grant
application :)

However if I get the grant=
 I will keep the group updated on my
progress. I think the more people work=
ing full time on NEAT related
projects the better.

--Shane
